analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Avijjā, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā anvadeva ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ;
analyzed: avijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā akusalānam dhammānam samāpattiyā ahirikam anottappa

original: vijjā ca kho, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyā anvadeva hirottappan”ti.
analyzed: vijjā ca kho bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā kusalānam dhammānam samāpattiyā hirā uttappanti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
